overview: I worked as a Software Developer providing offshore development and staff augmentation services to various clients. During my time there, I was assigned to Kindful and Venture360, where I contributed to bug fixes, feature development, and front-end modernization. My work involved Ruby on Rails, ReactJS, and VueJS, focusing on improving application performance and user experience. Through these projects, I gained experience adapting to different development environments and collaborating with diverse teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.

My primary role was migrating legacy Ruby on Rails views to VueJS, modernizing the platform for improved performance and user experience. I refactored and rebuilt UI components, ensuring a smooth transition from server-rendered views to a more dynamic, interactive frontend. Working closely with backend APIs, I optimized data fetching and state management for better responsiveness. I also collaborated with the team to enhance the overall architecture, improving maintainability and scalability. My contributions helped create a more efficient, user-friendly platform for Venture360’s clients.

I focused on fixing bugs and implementing new features to enhance the user experience of the nonprofit fundraising platform. Using Ruby on Rails and ReactJS, I contributed to building RESTful APIs, improving user experience, and improving system performance. My role involved troubleshooting issues, refining UI components, and optimizing backend processes to create a more intuitive and reliable platform for nonprofit professionals. Through agile development and collaboration with cross-functional teams, I helped improve the software’s usability, allowing organizations to better manage donor relationships and fundraising efforts.

I developed scalable web applications using Ruby on Rails, ReactJS, and PostgreSQL, contributing to innovative solutions across logistics, government,  and other industries. I built and optimized RESTful APIs, implemented interactive ReactJS interfaces, and ensured database performance for high-traffic applications. Collaborating with cross-functional teams, I translated business requirements into efficient software solutions. Through agile development, I played a key role in driving digital transformation for clients.

Implement features and maintain the different modules(admin, student, registrar, edp, etc.) of BISU-ISMIS (Integrated School Management and Information System) in both front-end and back-end. Develop an online admission portal for application of incoming students (new, transferee and returnee) in both front-end and back-end.
